message.body: Does the frameshop need someone to fill in while you are away? I would be interested. Also I'm going to baltimore for the weekend so I can get the materials from u next week
Oh, I'm not sure if I'm going back, but he does need someone asap! I would call him, and I can email him. If you wanna work there, he's gonna try to pay
you as little as possible, bit you can negotiate. He is desperate. It has a lot of perks working there though in terms of getting materials.
Let him know that I'm interested. I'll deal with negotiating pay
Are you talking about 1x6s? That would be cool? I think Michael has scraps.... But it doesn't matter. I couldn't gather materials this week BC I had an o
But I should talk with u about a starting point for negotiating pay
He might not go much higher that that, but you should be able to make at least $15! I couldn't get him to give me more than $12.50...which is basically w
No one is there...hence the Desperation
Well let him know and pass along his info so I can contact him
I just sent him an email and tried to cc you but don't have your email!
